item.title: Steve's Email
item.description: Email sent 25th May 2015 Steve Seddon to Chris Aitken Hi Chris. I finally get down to spending some quality time on your questions; thanks for your patience. I thought it best to deal with your points one by one (your point in green, my response in blue): At a meeting of what were known as the elders of Great Britain, the following six points were laid down to be accepted by all:
